Flow.description: Handover task, Status and last modified date update. Added Check for test generic & process EHR fields. Adding Custom setting skip check.

value.stringValue: not(isblank([Account].Household_1__c )) && not(isblank([Account].Legacy_Case_Number__c )) && [Account].RecordType.DeveloperName == 'ERM_Patient' && ( IF( ISNEW(), ([Account].Process_EHR_Records__c == false), ( OR ( NOT( ISCHANGED( [Account].Test_Type_Generic__c) ), NOT( ISCHANGED( [Account].Test_Result_Generic__c) ), NOT( ISCHANGED( [Account].Test_Date_Generic__c) ) ) && NOT($Setup.Skip_Account_Automation__c.Skip_Account_Process_Builder__c) ) ) )

formulas.name: formula_myRule_1
formulas.expression: not(isblank({!myVariable_current.Household_1__c} )) && not(isblank({!myVariable_current.Legacy_Case_Number__c} )) && {!myVariable_current.RecordType.DeveloperName} == 'ERM_Patient' && ( IF( ISNEW(), ({!myVariable_current.Process_EHR_Records__c} == false), ( OR ( NOT( ISCHANGED( {!myVariable_current.Test_Type_Generic__c}) ), NOT( ISCHANGED( {!myVariable_current.Test_Result_Generic__c}) ), NOT( ISCHANGED( {!myVariable_current.Test_Date_Generic__c}) ) ) && NOT({!$Setup.Skip_Account_Automation__c.Skip_Account_Process_Builder__c}) ) ) )

value.stringValue: [Account].RecordType.DeveloperName == 'ERM_Patient' && not(CONTAINS(text([Account].HealthCloudGA__Testing_Status__pc ), 'Positive') ) && ischanged([Account].Case_Status__c ) && ispickval([Account].Case_Status__c,'Active') && ( IF( ISNEW(), ([Account].Process_EHR_Records__c == false), ( OR ( NOT( ISCHANGED( [Account].Test_Type_Generic__c) ), NOT( ISCHANGED( [Account].Test_Result_Generic__c) ), NOT( ISCHANGED( [Account].Test_Date_Generic__c) ) ) && NOT($Setup.Skip_Account_Automation__c.Skip_Account_Process_Builder__c) ) ) )

formulas.expression: not(isblank({!myVariable_current.HealthCloudGA__PrimaryContact__r.Deceased_Date_Contact__c})) && {!myVariable_current.RecordType.DeveloperName} == 'ERM_Patient' && not(ispickval({!myVariable_current.HealthCloudGA__PrimaryContact__r.Latest_Status_Picklist__c} ,'Deceased')) && ( IF( ISNEW(), ({!myVariable_current.Process_EHR_Records__c} == false), ( OR ( NOT( ISCHANGED( {!myVariable_current.Test_Type_Generic__c}) ), NOT( ISCHANGED( {!myVariable_current.Test_Result_Generic__c}) ), NOT( ISCHANGED( {!myVariable_current.Test_Date_Generic__c}) ) ) && NOT({!$Setup.Skip_Account_Automation__c.Skip_Account_Process_Builder__c}) ) ) )

value.stringValue: ( ispickval([Account].Case_Status__c,'Inactive') ) && [Account].RecordType.DeveloperName == 'ERM_Patient' && not(ispickval([Account].HealthCloudGA__PrimaryContact__r.Latest_Status_Picklist__c ,'Recovered')) && (isblank([Account].HealthCloudGA__PrimaryContact__r.Deceased_Date_Contact__c)) && ( IF( ISNEW(), ([Account].Process_EHR_Records__c == false), ( OR ( NOT( ISCHANGED( [Account].Test_Type_Generic__c) ), NOT( ISCHANGED( [Account].Test_Result_Generic__c) ), NOT( ISCHANGED( [Account].Test_Date_Generic__c) ) ) && NOT($Setup.Skip_Account_Automation__c.Skip_Account_Process_Builder__c) ) ) )
